TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but due to confusion, walruses now randomly spawn around the Kerbal Space Center.

I wish for a blender.

The walrusses take over the KSC and the Kerbal Space Program had to shut down.

I wish for a working Ethernet connection on my PC. (Really)

Granted, but a rat then infiltrates your house, only to destroy your Ethernet cable.

I wish for a hot cup of tea.

Edited October 13, 2016 by ZentroCatson

Too bad it is a cup with the letters T, E and A in it.

i wish for a ticket Mars.

Granted, you get a Ticket Mars. It's a ticket with a picture of Mars, and gets you a free spin on the Lollipop Wheel.

I wish for a vibraphone and a place to put it.

Granted, you get that but everything else you own disappears and all your loved ones die,

I wish that the next poster will corrupt my wish!

10 hours ago, KAL 9000 said:

Granted, you get that but everything else you own disappears and all your loved ones die,

I wish that the next poster will corrupt my wish!

Humanity solved the paradox by killing you

i wish for a never ending battery

Granted. It's in your back yard firing constantly night and day.

I wish for legal immunity to speed limits.

Granted, and then you wrap your car around the next tree.

I wish KSP cargo bays would finally occlude drag.

Granted. Squad reach an agreement with Ferram to put FAR's aerodynamics in the stock game.

I wish Lego minifigs didn't get knocked off their bricks so easily.

Granted. There are no studs on LEGOs anymore.

 

I wish for some food.

nope you 'll just get winkallkerb' instead (approaching a black hole  is a bit weird if you'r still attempting to reach the star for me but well if your a boson i can eventually "attempt" to make an exception of course there no guaranatee you'll be able to turn your way back ^^)

i wish you ask me for something ^^

Edited October 14, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''

Granted. I wonder if a moderator will help clean up the thread...

 

I wish a mod would clean up the thread.
Granted. All of your posts on the forums are deleted.
İ wish Note 7 have heatsinks that have a cooler fan works with external 9 volt battery

Granted. Note 7 gets cool (in both senses), but you get pneumonia.

I wish pixels were round.

Granted. I don't even need to corrupt that wish, round pixels would be bad enough on their own.

I wish for a fish that is neither poisonous, nor big enough to eat and/or crush me.

Granted, but it breathes fire at you.

I wish for an electromagnetic trebuchet.

11 hours ago, cubinator said:

Granted, but it breathes fire at you.

I wish for an electromagnetic trebuchet.

Your secondary Kerbonauts were high on rocket fuel and they tried to build on Jool to maximize efficency

İ wish for a 0.1 Faber castell mech pencil

Granted, but you accidentally break it in half.

I wish for Equestria to be hit by a class E asteroid.

Pre-granted, Equestria is located above the E-asteroid falling site.

I wish Harry Potter were Frodo Baggins. (Or vice versa.)

Edited October 17, 2016 by kerbiloid

Granted. Harry Potter is too big to crawl through the tunnels of Cirith Ungol, and the ring falls into the hands of Shelob and from her, Sauron. Frodo Baggins doesn't know any magic and gets killed by Lord Voldemort.

I wish I could sleep.

Granted, you can only sleep when the sun is up on Olympus Mons.

I wish for a spacesuit.

Granted. Its Kerbal sized.

I wish to go to space.

Granted.

But the contract you created for that is made for a kerbal so you only stay in space for a few seconds.

 

I wish I could stop procrastinating here
